evidence.name: Coffee Analysis
evidence.description: Chemical analysis of the coffee revealed arsenic (As) concentrations significantly above the regulatory limit for drinking water. Such elevated levels are consistent with chronic exposure over time rather than a single high-dose event.
truth_base: matrix is coffee (a commonly consumed beverage)

evidence.name: Pill Analysis
evidence.description: Elemental analysis of the pill detected barium (Ba) in quantities far exceeding safe intake levels. A single dose at this concentration is consistent with an acute, rapid-onset toxic effect.
